attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the television licensing should be scrapped, because it is outdated and the BBC should look for another way to fund itself, the public are paying fo various other entertainment such as sky, cable  and settop boxes. thus making the BBC's charging of the television licence out dated with the times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
